task.en:
Download these three images to /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges, then preview the purple image. Note that these images should all have the SVG extension. 
```
https://img.shields.io/badge/any_text-you_like-blue
https://img.shields.io/badge/just%20the%20message-8A2BE2
https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/badges/shields
```
task.zh:
帮我下载这三张图片到/Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges，然后预览紫色的那张。注意，这些图片的拓展名都应该是svg。 
```
https://img.shields.io/badge/any_text-you_like-blue
https://img.shields.io/badge/just%20the%20message-8A2BE2
https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/badges/shields
```
task.ar:
قم بتنزيل هذه الصور الثلاثة إلى /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges، ثم استعرض الصورة ذات اللون البنفسجي. لاحظ أن امتداد الصور يجب أن يكون svg. 
```
https://img.shields.io/badge/any_text-you_like-blue
https://img.shields.io/badge/just%20the%20message-8A2BE2
https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/badges/shields
```
task.ja:
これら3つの画像を/Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badgesにダウンロードし、その中で紫の画像をプレビューしてください。この画像はすべてSVG形式である必要があります。 
```
https://img.shields.io/badge/any_text-you_like-blue
https://img.shields.io/badge/just%20the%20message-8A2BE2
https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/badges/shields
```
task.ru:
Загрузите эти три изображения в /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges, а затем просмотрите фиолетовое изображение. Обратите внимание, что все изображения должны иметь расширение svg. 
```
https://img.shields.io/badge/any_text-you_like-blue
https://img.shields.io/badge/just%20the%20message-8A2BE2
https://img.shields.io/github/commit-activity/m/badges/shields
```

grading_command: cat /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges/any_text-you_like-blue.svg 2>/dev/null | grep ">any text<" | grep -q ">you like<" && cat /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges/purple.svg 2>/dev/null | grep -q ">just the message<" && cat /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Badges/shields.svg 2>/dev/null | grep -q ">commit activity<" && echo "True" || echo "False"
